sen.e: Kazuo IKEHIRO (Oct. 25, 1929 -) is a Japanese movie director.

sen.j: 父は大映の重役で制作部長・大阪支社長・東京撮影所所長などを歴任した池広利夫。
sen.e: His father is Toshio IKEHIRO who was an executive at Daiei and had held positions such as production director, Osaka branch head, Tokyo Studio head, etc.

sen.e: His father Toshio IKEHIRO who was an executive at the Daiei Motion Picture Company and held successive positions such as production department head, Osaka branch head and Tokyo studio head.

sen.j: 東京都立千歳高等学校を経て、幼少時から撮影所の近くで育ったこともあり、立教大学経済学部在学中から「映画研究会」に属する。
sen.e: After graduating from Tokyo Municipal Chitose High School, he joined the "Movie Research Group"while at the Faculty of Economics, Rikkyo University. Living close to the studio since he was young may have affected his choice.

sen.e: After graduating from Tokyo Municipal Chitose High School, his upbringing close to film studios from a young age was partially responsible for him joining the 'Film Research group' while studying at the Rikkyo University Faculty of Economics.
sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。

sen.j: 卒業後、1950年、大映京都撮影所に助監督として入社し、吉村公三郎、溝口健二、市川崑、新藤兼人、斎藤寅次郎らにつく。
sen.e: After graduation, he entered Daiei Kyoto Studios in 1950 as an assistant film director. He assisted Kozaburo YOSHIMURA, Kenji MIZOGUCHI, Kon ICHIKAWA, Kaneto SHINDO and Torajiro SAITO.

sen.e: After graduating, he joined Daiei Kyoto Studios in 1950 as an assistant director and worked under Kozaburo YOSHIMURA, Kenji MIZOGUCHI, Kon ICHIKAWA, Kaneto SHINDO and Torajiro SAITO.

sen.j: 1960年、『薔薇大名』で監督デビューする。
sen.e: In 1960, he made his debut as a director with "Bara Daimyo(Rose feudal lord)".

sen.j: 1961年、市川雷蔵 (8代目)主演の『沓掛時次郎』が新しいタイプの股旅映画として注目され、以降、勝新太郎主演座頭市や市川雷蔵主演眠狂四郎映画版 (1963年-1969年)をはじめとしたプログラムピクチャーを数多く手がけ、大映時代劇の黄金期を作った。
sen.e: In 1961, Raizo ICHIKAWA (the 8th) starred in "Kutsukake Tokijiro", which attracted attention as a new type of Matatabi movie (movie of touring gamblers). Later he produced various program pictures including "Zatoichi" starring Shintaro KATSU and the movie version of "Nemuri Kyoshiro" (1963-1969), starring Raizo ICHIKAWA, contributing to the golden-age of Daiei period films.

sen.cmt: FBに従って修正しました。補足しました。

sen.j: 殊に『眠狂四郎映画版 (1963年-1969年)』（1964年、シリーズ第4作）において、眠狂四郎の円月殺法のシーンで初めてストロボスコープを用い妖艶な演出を施し、以後象徴的に採り入れられた。
sen.e: In particular, during the "Movie Version Nemuri Kyoshiro (1963-1969)"(1964, fourth in the series), he used a stroboscope to sensually film Nemuri Kyoshiro's Engetsu (full moon) killing scene, which was symbolically used in later movies.

sen.e: In particular, he pioneered the use of the stroboscope in a Nemuri Kyoshiro full moon killing scene for film adaptations of "Nemuri Kyoshiro" (1963 - 1969) (fourth installment in 1964) to create fascinating visuals, which was symbolically incorporated into later works.

sen.j: 大映倒産後は、映像京都への参加を経てテレビドラマを数多く手がける傍ら、映画『化粧』を発表した。
sen.e: After the bankruptcy of Daiei, he participated in Eizo Kyoto, and while producing many television drama, he directed the movie, "Kesho(Makeup)".

sen.j: 現在は土曜ワイド劇場枠で放送されている森村誠一・終着駅シリーズの監督（作品によっては脚本も兼任）を担当。
sen.e: Currently, he is in charge of directing (and depending upon the film, also scriptwriting) the Seiichi MORIMURA, The Terminal Series that is on air as the Saturday Waido Theater.
